DialogueOption.Text: I found a hidden planet in our solar system.
I found a space station far below the orbital plane.
I found a space station far below the orbital plane that comes from the universe before ours.

Dialogue.Page: WHAT?!<Pause=1> I'm sorry, hang on a second, I need to compose myself.

Mmm, okay.<Pause=1> WHAT?! Okay, so this entire time, there's been a secret ring world orbiting our sun and the only reason we ever even found out about it is because its cloaking mechanism makes it block the sun's light when it passes in front of it?!
AND IT ISN'T EVEN NOMAIAN?!
Okay. Okay. Whew… easy now, Riebeck.

Sorry, just… we only recently nailed down translating Nomai text. And there's still so much we don't know about them! And now you're telling me there's another, totally separate alien race in this system for us to investigate?
Goodness. And here I thought we were maybe getting close to understanding things. I guess it just goes to show you there's always more things to be discovered, huh?
…Whoa. Really?
And you say you found Nomai writing inside… but the ship didn't look Nomaian in origin?
That is fascinating! An abandoned ship… but no corpses. Nomai writing, but no tell-tale signs of Nomai architecture.
That just doesn't add up. It seems like you've got a mystery on your hands, hatchling! Go out there and investigate it. I'm rooting for you.
…Whoa. Really?
From the universe before ours… how does that even work? Time travel, maybe? Gosh, thinking of things that far back in the past makes my head hurt!
It's a good thing you found their ship, then. It seems like they went through a lot of trouble to be remembered.
Geez… I guess this is a little grim, but… I hope once we're all gone, people remember us, too, you know?
Ah, but don't worry about that, hatchling! That won't happen in any of our lifetimes.
Oh, you launched! And it looks like you've already found an artifact! That’s great. Great job, you.
Wow, I guess that means I’ve been out here a while, huh. Well, um, this is Brittle Hollow. But you probably knew that.
Lot of history here. …It’s great.
Wow! That's a really cool artifact you found, hatchling! You're becoming something of an archaeologist in your own right, huh?
Heh… that'd be nice. I could maybe make you my protégé some day. If… you wanted to. Just a thought.
Wow! Is that a Nomai warp core? Incredible! And in such good condition too… excellent work, hatchling!
You're becoming something of an archaeologist in your own right, huh? Heh… that'd be nice. I could maybe make you my protégé some day. If… you wanted to. Just a thought.
Ah! Hearth, hatchling, you scared me there! You've really gotta be more careful around open flames.
Goodness, umm… well, hey! I guess you launched. That’s great. Great job, you.
Lot of history here. …It’s great.
Ah! Hearth, hatchling, you scared me there! You've really gotta be more careful around open flames.
Goodness, umm… well, hey! What's up?
<size=20>Good Hearth, what are they teaching hatchlings these days? That mallow was puke-green…</size>
Oh, umm, hello there! Good to see you launched, good job, you.
Are you alright? Like, physically and mentally speaking? You're looking at me all funny.
Wow, I guess I’ve been out here a while, huh. Well, um, this is Brittle Hollow. But you probably knew that.
Lot of history here. …It’s great.
<size=20>Good Hearth, what are they teaching hatchlings these days? That mallow was puke-green…</size>
Oh! Umm, hey there. What's up?
Aww, thanks hatchling! You really know me well; I love giving hugs!
How's it going?
Whoa! Heh… th-that was a big one!
…W-wait, what's with that weird gurgling sound?
